..btw if u use script mods u eventually freeze , theres no way in hell u never freeze no matter how many mods u open , the reason the game and everyone sees it is because ur scripts are going to a server side ,

 if u have auto spawns like these mods have (cars show up autmatically and map mods appear auto,) then eventually adding those to more mods u open will eventually freeze, dont believe other wise...

these mods arent meant for auto spawners i added those so eventually people keep opening mods , then it freezes, but if ur in a small game u never do , scripts on server plus a full game - ull freeze soon, dont believe any mess like script mods plus never freeze for a month lmao..

ill upload a 3.0 without the auto spawners soon , but i really enjoy these ones i custom made plus the eta for download is under 1 HOUR!

...and thats how those freeze cars work , if anyone wanted to know, 

normal players have normal scripts that the server reads everyone has a number and a slot on the server, when u over load ur player wit 40 mods or alot of mods in a short amount of time u will freeze...

thus the "freeze car" fills up the other plays slots full of bogus scripts till they all freeze, and in my research ive never seen script mods be writting onto a real gta disc without the hotswap method, maybe usb is for modded xboxs or something but i never heard of em
